name: Dallas Ray VARVA, Petitioner v. CLERK OF CRIMINAL COURTS OF MONROE COUNTY, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Varva v. Clerk of Criminal Courts of Monroe County

parties: Dallas Ray VARVA, Petitioner v. CLERK OF CRIMINAL COURTS OF MONROE COUNTY, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 27th day of January, 2015, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Mandamus and the Application for Appointment of Counsel are DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
108 A.3d 1278
Dallas Ray VARVA, Petitioner v. CLERK OF CRIMINAL COURTS OF MONROE COUNTY, Respondent.
No. 190 MM 2014.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Jan. 27, 2015.
